## Upgrade firmware layout for [TEK227](https://www.trulyergonomic.com/store/model-differences--truly-ergonomic-mechanical-keyboard--cherry-mx-brown-red-blue-black-clear-keyswitches#Model-227) with dvorak/qwerty spanish layout 

```
$ git clone https://github.com/m-ou-se/teck-programmer
$ cd teck-programmer
$ sudo apt-get install libudev-dev nodejs-legacy
$ npm install -g teck-programmer
$ teck-firmware-upgrade TrulyErgonomic_v4_00.hex
```
* Edit my customized dvorak/qwerty spanish layout [here](https://www.trulyergonomic.com/store/layout-designer--configurator--reprogrammable--truly-ergonomic-mechanical-keyboard/#)
